description.displayText: Tricia is wonderful!  She is very responsive, reliable, dependable, on time, and great with my toddler.  She occasionally babysits at night for us.  She is a pleasure to work with and I feel very confident leaving my child with her.  She also cleans up the toys and kitchen after she puts my daughter to bed.  So glad that I found her!
description.originalText: Tricia is wonderful!  She is very responsive, reliable, dependable, on time, and great with my toddler.  She occasionally babysits at night for us.  She is a pleasure to work with and I feel very confident leaving my child with her.  She also cleans up the toys and kitchen after she puts my daughter to bed.  So glad that I found her!

description.displayText: Okay, so honestly I don't want to write this because Tricia is incredible and I don't want her to be too busy to watch my baby! =) I found her very last minute and she is now a regular in our home. I am a new mom and to hand my sweet 8 month old girl over to a stranger was more than I could handle. Tricia was so sweet and even CAME WITH ME to the appointment I had & watched baby in another room! My little girl LOVED(S) her! After my appointment Tricia sat with us at a Starbucks for over an hour and was willing to answer any questions I had about her, her growing up, her nannying styles - all of it. She is incredibly patient with my baby, has taught her fun things (waving, peek-a-boo, etc.), reads to her, sings to her, crawls around on the floor with her. One character trait I REALLY APPRECIATE is that she will carry through with actions/directions SPECIFICALLY how I list it out. There is no 2nd guessing on if something will be done right. I ALWAYS come home to a CLEAN HOUSE. I don't mean just toys put away - I mean floors swept, mopped, vacuumed, shelves dusted, clothes washed, dried, hung-up, dishes loaded, emptied, put away... trashes taken out, stove-top cleaned (she is usually here at least a few hours). Basically, if it needs to be done, you can trust it'll be done! I never worry or think my child is in ANYTHING but the BEST of care. She will even text me cute pics or videos when my baby does something new or funny. I would NEVER post a positive remark on anyone I didn't truly believe and know was trustworthy in my home and trustworthy to care for the most precious and irreplaceable thing in my life. We are very grateful for Nanny Tricia at our house! =)

description.displayText: Tricia has watched our two young girls several times and we love her! We were new to town and we didn't have any friends or family to recommend sitters, so we turned to care.com. I have to admit that I was very nervous about having someone I did not know watch our children. But upon meeting Tricia, I was immediately put at ease. She is great with our two girls! They are always excited for her to arrive and ask about when she'll be back all the time. We are so happy that we found such a great sitter. I highly recommend Tricia.

description.displayText: Tricia nannied for us briefly this past winter while our nanny was out of the country.  To say our daughter was a handful at the time is an understatement.  Our baby was on multiple medications and having a very hard time adjusting to being away from mommy, but Tricia kept her cool and took great care of her-sometimes holding her in her arms all day if she needed it.  Somehow she managed to take care of our preschool aged son as well.  I would definitely recommend her to anyone with a high needs baby, especially one who requires frequent medication and lots of attention.

description.displayText: Tricia is our first babysitter and she is the BEST we could ever find for our daughter. She really connected with our daughter in her first meeting and we could see that she was really happy in her presence. Our daughter is our first baby and I would admit that I am a little possessive about her, but with Tricia I never had to worry! Tricia always paid good attention to details I mentioned and never disappointed me, I mean you can really count on her when you are leaving your baby with her :)I would definitely recommend her to all my friends ! We love you Tricia:)

We love you Tricia:)

description.displayText:
Hands down, Tricia is one of the best sitters we have ever had the pleasure of working with. Without a doubt, she is our preferred sitter over others, including family and friends. She is punctual and great with our little boy, who is 9-months old. He just adores her. Our dog also loves her, too.  
Furthermore, she does housework when the opportunity arises. It is always a joy to see her, but even more of a joy to come home from an evening out to find a clean house. For first-time parents like us, if you are on the fence about a sitter, then hop down and give Tricia a call. I only wish we had the opportunity to use her services full time.

description.displayText: Tricia worked with us a few times.  She was prompt, and got a lot done while taking good care of our child.  Highly recommended!!!
description.originalText: Tricia worked with us a few times.  She was prompt, and got a lot done while taking good care of our child.  Highly recommended!!!

description.displayText: We hired Tricia to take care of our 2 year old son and help keep our house in order on a part time basis.  She has truly been a blessing to our family.  Our son loves her and she does a great job cleaning our house.  We have a two bedroom apartment and she is able to take care of our son and clean our entire house in 6 hours.  She has reorganized things to make it more functional for us.  She has helped our son spell words and she is assisting with his potty training.  If we could afford it we would not hesitate to hire her full time.

description.displayText: Tricia has worked for us since September, and we absolutely love her. We would employ her forever, but sadly she is moving away. She is smart, great with our four boys, hard-working and reliable. She keeps our very busy household moving in an orderly, loving way. We will miss her very much!

She is smart, great with our four boys, hard-working and reliable. She keeps our very busy household moving in an orderly, loving way. We will miss her very much!

description.displayText: Tricia has helped us out on several occasions when we needed urgent childcare.  She was amazing, taking fabulous care of our children, and even doing dishes we never asked her to take care of.  She is always on time, very responsible, and wonderful with children.  She is an excellent choice for your family.
